commands:
**I know the following commands:**
`1.` help: Shows this list of commands.
`2.` invite: Shows the link to invite this bot!
`3.` stats: Displays general info about me such as my current version.
`4.` userinfo: Displays general information about a user *in the server*.
`5.` serverinfo: Displays general information about the server.
`6.` say: Makes me say stuff and deletes your message.
`7.` sayembed: Makes me say stuff, deletes your message and puts your text into a sexy embed!
`8.` ping: Displays the current latency to the Discord API and my client.
`9.` stealavatar: Steals the avatar URL of the provided user by mention.
`10.` eval: (Owner Only) Evaluates JavaScript.
`11.` shutdown: (Owner Only) Shuts the bot down.
`12.` setavatar: (Owner Only) Changes the bot's avatar.
`13.` setname: (Owner Only) Sets the new name of the bot.
`14.` setstatus: (Owner Only) Sets the new status of the bot, for example *idle*.
`15.` setgame: (Owner Only) Sets the new playing status of the bot.
